Title: Authorizes and directs the workers' compensation board to redetermine the award of volunteer firefighter disability benefits to William DuBois of New Paltz, New York
Summary: Authorizes and directs the workers' compensation board to redetermine the award of volunteer firefighter disability benefits to William DuBois of New Paltz, New York who was injured in the line of duty; provides that such redetermination shall be made as if such injury had occurred on or after July 1, 1992.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize and direct the workers' compensation board to redetermine the award of volunteer firefighter benefits to William DuBois of New Paltz, New York who was injured in the line of duty
